name: Revenge (Jam Week 150)
description:
[DOWNLOADING THE GAME IS A X10 BETTER EXPERIENCE]

[PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN FOR IT TO WORK PROPERLY (ONLINE VERSION]

[Revenge]

Game made for the Weekly Game Jam #150.

The Theme of the Jam was "You're the enemy".

It's about a Boss who's fed up being defeated by players so decides to finally fight back properly and win.

Place traps and drones during preparation time to help you fight against the player. Defeat multiple waves to go to the next levels.

Disclaimer: All assets and music were made by our talented team for the exception of some particle effects and some models for level environment (free licence on them).

A game made in a Week By,

RaideNnight (Programmer)
Micnasr (Programmer & Art)

Jay (Programmer & Level Design)
RyanMcGaughey (Music Producer)

Eperson (3D Modeler)

Professor Plow (Music Producer)
